Portions of IRM 10.8.30, Information Technology (IT) Security, Unisys Operating System (OS) Security Standards, dated 09-20-2018, are obsolete as of the IRM effective date and the portions are incorporated into IRM 10.8.33, Mainframe System Security Policy.
The material in section 10.8.30.3.1.1(2) is obsolete because it is a non-requirement generic
The material relating to AC-3 Access Enforcement previously contained in IRM section 10.8.30.3.1.2 is incorporated into new IRM 10.8.33.3.1.2.

IRM 10.8.30, dated September 20, 2018, is obsolete as of the date of this transmittal.
AUDIENCE

IRM 10.8.30 shall be distributed to all personnel responsible for ensuring that adequate security is provided for IRS information and information systems. This policy applies to all employees, contractors, and vendors of the IRS.
